title: Interview stories flat
context: Composite of graduates whose interview stories sounded generic and failed to communicate impact.
session_flow: Audited existing stories and identified missing stakes, actions and reflections.
Rebuilt two STAR stories with vivid details and rehearsed follow-up questions.
Recorded mock interviews to observe pacing and reduce filler.
boundary_and_consent: Student could delete any recording immediately and opted into which clips we analysed together.
timeframe: 3 sessions over 4 weeks with asynchronous transcript reviews.
shift: They sounded more grounded describing impact and could handle probing without spiralling.
outcome: Received clearer feedback from interviewers about specific strengths and advanced to final rounds.
fallbackNotice: 目前暂以英文内容呈现，完整翻译即将补上。
